title: Kamandi Archives, Vol. 2
description: The incredible adventures of the Last Boy on Earth continue in this 228-page volume collecting KAMANDI #11-20! This volume features such classic doses of dystopian future-shock by Kirby as "Hell at Hialeah!", "The Human Gophers of Ohio!" and "The Last Gang in Chicago" plus an introduction by KAMANDI inker Mike Royer.
author: Jack Kirby
